participant_1.background:
I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.
I spent more time climbing since I quit my job.
My dream is to open a restaurant and share my love of food with others.
i listen to katie perry while in the shower.
i have 10 alpacas.

participant_2.background:
I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears.
I have a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work.
I have an old laptop that I use to read sci-fi space adventures.
both my parents were over 6 foot tall.
I'm not always the most graceful person, and I've had my fair share of bike crashes and nail polish disasters.

content.text: Not much. I\'m working from home today. I have a crib in my office so I can keep an eye on my kid while I work.
That\'s cool. I\'m working on my novel. I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.
That\'s awesome. I\'m not always the most graceful person, and I've had my fair share of bike crashes and nail polish disasters.
Oh no! I\'m sorry to hear that. I hope you\'re okay.
I'm fine. I just have to be more careful. What\'s your novel about?
It\'s a sci-fi space adventure. I\'ve been working on it for a while now, and I\'m finally starting to get some traction.
That\'s amazing. I love sci-fi. I have an old laptop that I use to read sci-fi space adventures.
That\'s so cool. I\'m always on the lookout for new sci-fi books to read.
I\'ve been reading a lot of old sci-fi books lately. I love the classic stuff.
Me too. I think the older sci-fi books are more imaginative.
I agree. They\'re not afraid to be weird or different.
Me too. I think it\'s important to be creative and original.
I totally agree. That\'s what I\'m trying to do with my novel.
I\'m sure you\'re going to do great. I can\'t wait to read it.
Thank you. I\'ll let you know when it\'s finished.
Great. I\'ll be looking forward to it.
